title: Chapter 727 - The Ye Family’S Homicidal Maniac
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 727 - The Ye Family’S Homicidal Maniac

Azurecloud Court

Sunlight poured in through the pines and bamboo, casting mottled light on the ground. 

A clear breeze blew past, bringing with it the smell of fresh grass and earth.

Ye Yunlan watched the young man in blue sprawled out in a wicker chair in silence for a while before saying, “I have to leave for a little while.”

Su Yi hadn’t expected that. “Are you going back to the Mysterious Blue Realm?”

Ye Yunlan shook his head. “The Ye Family almost certainly sent more experts to the Azure Continent than just the three of them. There’s something I have to go investigate and either confirm or disprove.”

“What is it?”

“I’m worried because it seems highly likely that the clan’s homicidal maniac has come too,” said Ye Yunlan.

The clan's homicidal maniac!

When he discussed said homicidal maniac, Ye Yunlan’s expression grew unusually solemn.

Su Yi, however, seemed intrigued. “Is he strong?”

“He’s not just strong. He’s twisted,” Ye Yunlan said grimly. “His name is Ye Xiao, and he’s a madman who proves his Dao through slaughter. He’s obsessed with killing his enemies on the battlefield, and in the Mysterious Blue Realm, he’s slain countless experts. His...
original_title: Chapter 727 - The Ye Family’s Homicidal Maniac
